name: n0d3::Champions
description:
Welcome to the Champion's Arena!

n0d3::Champions is a fast paced fighting adventure that pits you against the most deadly foes that the Oculus has ever known!

Choose your warrior and prepare for mayhem as you and your foes battle to the death in with three lives, multiple unique fighting styles and an endless assortment of combos!

Compete against your friends and enemies in a fight to the death or play solo as you attempt to conquer over 60 unique characters in their home environments.

Users looking for endless carnage can enter the Arena of their choice and fight until they drop!

Users will have the ability to play solo, with friends, online or in an endless combat arena. The game currently features 16 characters and 7 different levels with 60 characters planned. Each character will have it's own unique level.
